articles.title: Microsoft prepares major Windows 11 feature drop with new Start menu, Taskbar updates, and more | New features expected to roll out next month - Windows Central
articles.description: Windows 11's next major update is set to include a brand-new Start menu, lots of Taskbar and File Explorer updates, and general quality of life improvements, which is now in the final testing stages before general availability.

articles.title: AI chatbots fail at accurate news, major study reveals - DW
articles.description: AI chatbots such as ChatGPT and Copilot routinely distort the news and struggle to distinguish facts from opinion. That's according to a major new study from 22 international public broadcasters, including DW.

articles.title: Apple slashes iPhone Air production plans, boosts other 17 models: sources - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Overall sales of new lineup defies weak market and tariff war

articles.title: OpenAI launches browser to rival Google Chrome - DW
articles.description: Atlas, OpenAI's new ChatGPT-powered browser, launched on Tuesday looking to "rethink what a browser can be about" and challenge the hegemony of Google Chrome. But how accurate are AI browsers?

articles.title: GameCube Classic Luigi's Mansion Hits Nintendo Switch 2 Just in Time for Halloween - IGN
articles.description: Luigi's Mansion is finally coming to the Nintendo Switch Online library. Debuting on October 30, the GameCube classic arrives just in time for Halloween, and means the entire trilogy, along with Luigi's Mansion 2 and Luigi's Mansion 3, is now playable on Nint…

articles.title: The first major OnePlus 15 price leak has encouraging news - Android Authority
articles.description: The OnePlus 15 is around the corner, and a price leak by a prominent tipster has some encouraging news for us.
